description.name: TigoPesa Payments
description.tagline: WHMCS TigoPesa Payment Gateway Merchant Solution.
description.long:
TigoPesa is the fast, easy, secure way to accept mobile payments and mobile online. Lipa Na TIGO-PESA empowers any business across the country to receive and also make payments from the convenience of a mobile phone. 

## Apply for Tigo Pesa APIs 
[Apply and request for the API documentation »](https://www.tigo.co.tz/tigo-pesa-for-developers)
features: Send direct USSD Push notification to client's mobile
Simplified checkout procedure, with order status updates as payments occur
Integrates with WHMCS for TigoPesa Payments Gateway
